segment.source: Use the SDK to enable apps for mobile application management
segment.target: Use the SDK to enable apps for mobile application management

segment.source: Use the SDK to enable apps for mobile application management
segment.target: Use the SDK to enable apps for mobile application management

segment.source: Use the Microsoft Intune App SDK to enable Intune to manage certain features of your iOS or Android mobile apps.
segment.target: Use the Microsoft Intune App SDK to enable Intune to manage certain features of your iOS or Android mobile apps.

segment.source: After your app is enabled, you can deploy policies to the app.
segment.target: After your app is enabled, you can deploy policies to the app.

segment.source: These policies use those features to protect your corporate data.
segment.target: These policies use those features to protect your corporate data.

segment.source: Examples of the types of protections that you can implement with the SDK are:
segment.target: Examples of the types of protections that you can implement with the SDK are:

segment.source: Prevent users from copying corporate documents to the cloud
segment.target: Prevent users from copying corporate documents to the cloud

segment.source: Require encryption of data that is saved to the device by the app.
segment.target: Require encryption of data that is saved to the device by the app.

segment.source: Enforce the use of a managed browser
segment.target: Enforce the use of a managed browser

segment.source: Remotely wipe corporate data from the app
segment.target: Remotely wipe corporate data from the app

segment.source: You need access to the app's source code to use the SDK, but you can enable most of the SDK features without having to change the app's behavior.
segment.target: You need access to the app's source code to use the SDK, but you can enable most of the SDK features without having to change the app's behavior.

segment.source: For an overview of the SDK, see the Overview page.
segment.target: For an overview of the SDK, see the Overview page.

segment.source: To start using the Intune App SDK, see Getting Started With the Microsoft Intune App SDK.
segment.target: To start using the Intune App SDK, see Getting Started With the Microsoft Intune App SDK.
